author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...POST-TROPICAL CYCLONE CHANTAL CONTINUES A FLASH FLOOD THREAT INTO THIS EVENING FOR PORTIONS OF THE EASTERN MID-ATLANTIC STATES...
summary: ...POST-TROPICAL CYCLONE CHANTAL CONTINUES A FLASH FLOOD THREAT INTO THIS EVENING FOR PORTIONS OF THE EASTERN MID-ATLANTIC STATES... As of 21:00 UTC MON JUL 07 2025 the center of Chantal was located near 38.8, -75.0 with movement NE at 21 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1012 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 25 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...POST-TROPICAL CYCLONE CHANTAL CONTINUES A FLASH FLOOD THREAT INTO THIS EVENING FOR PORTIONS OF THE EASTERN MID-ATLANTIC STATES... As of 21:00 UTC MON JUL 07 2025 the center of Chantal was located near 38.8, -75.0 with movement NE at 21 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1012 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 25 mph.

title: Summary - Post-Tropical Cyclone Chantal (AT3/AL032025)
